title: No Gaza inquiry, Israeli defense minister says
text:
No Gaza inquiry, Israeli defense minister says 12:03am IST - 01:49 
Israel’s defense minister rejected on Sunday calls for an inquiry into the killing of 15 Palestinians by the military during a Palestinian demonstration that turned violent on Friday at the Gaza-Israel border. Pascale Davies reports.   
Israel’s defense minister rejected on Sunday calls for an inquiry into the killing of 15 Palestinians by the military during a Palestinian demonstration that turned violent on Friday at the Gaza-Israel border. Pascale Davies reports.  //reut.rs/2H0IMh3
